item.title: 显示HN：在生产中使用LLM？
item.description: Co-Founder of Velatir, Michael here.We built Velatir to make it easy to add human-in-the-loop (HITL) decision points inside AI workflows and agents and help companies adopting AI workflows remain compliant.Velatir lets you pause the flow, route the decision to a human through your preferred channel (email, sms, slack, teams), and then resume automation instantly.一切都是快速，毫无记录，可自定义的，并且具有定价模型。我们目前正在与高风险环境（制造业和金融）的团队合作，在这些团队中，一个错误的决定可能会昂贵，并且合规性（例如欧盟AI AC，NIS2）的责任感，nis2）的责任感，伐木，伐木和人类的监督和人类的监督。 href =“ https://www.velatir.com” rel =“ nofollow”> https://www.velatir.com doc： https://www.velatir.com/docs/docs/introduction pypi： https://www.pypi.org/project/project/project/velatir/ Q3路线图： 评论url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id=44178681 点：1 ＃评论：0
